protocol.name: P-GSE26297-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE26297-2
protocol.text: Callus induction medium (CIM) were GM supplemented with 1 mg/liter biotin, 100 ng/ml 2,4-D as auxin and kinetin as cytokinin at the specified concentrations or TSA. Hypocotyl segments of seedlings were cultured for 3 days on CIM under comtinuous illumination (100 µEm-2s-1) at 23ºC , and then collected and rapidly frozen by liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE26297-3
protocol.text: The sterilized seeds were put on germination medium (GM) and stored at 4ºC for at least 1 day, and then moved to growth chambers at 23ºC. Seedlings to be used for the excision of hypocotyl segments for callus induction were grown for 10days under dim light (2.5 µEm-2s-1).

protocol.name: P-GSE26297-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE26297-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE26297-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Affymetrix Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0).
